(In reply to comment #5)
> Yes, several threads are able to create the same file.

In which case, the problem may well be at the FTP server end.

And if the server reports success, there's not a lot JMeter can do if the server has actually thrown away some of the data.

I doubt that there is a problem with JMeter here.

Try running several FTP clients in parallel and see if they behave any differently.
